forum.name: updates

forum.latestCommentText: im gonna miss it for sure

thread.title: Smoother desktop movement!

comments.text: Hi! In today's Update 181.3 (you're on [version]), desktop movement is now smoother!
For instance, this should improve results if you're recording a video. (Your movement may also appear smoother to others.)
You can toggle this setting back to the old style -- or make it even stronger -- by clicking on the Camera icon in the Me dialog and toggling the options. Hope you enjoy!

thread.latestCommentText: You can toggle this setting back to the old style -- or make it even stronger -- by clicking on the Camera icon in the Me dialog and toggling the options. Hope you enjoy!
